page.title: 04A DAY IN A LIFE
page.content:
I have lived in Bournemouth all of my life. I have been on holiday twice out of Bournemouth but I have never been abroad.
On a school day we have five lessons which last for fifty-five minutes each. My form teacher is Miss Little and I help her whenever she asks me, most of the time I take the register to the Secretary and collect the credits for the rest of the class. I take a packed lunch to school everyday, I have sandwiches, crisps which I eat at break in the morning, biscuits and cakes. I take a drink of orange juice in a flask. I have been to several different schools before coming to Avonbourne, my Junior School was called Summerbee.
Dawn Yates
